name: vesta-ui
description: Librer√≠a de UX/UI independiente de frameworks

scripts.build: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y src dist && xcopy /E /I /Y demos dist\demos
scripts.update:icons: if not exist dist\icons mkdir dist\icons && xcopy /E /I /Y src\icons dist\icons
scripts.deploy:dist: cd dist && git add . && git commit -m 'Actualizando dist en GitHub' && git push origin main
